Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-21100 affecting package nodejs18 for versions less than 18.20.2-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-21100 affecting package nodejs18 for versions less than 18.20.2-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package nodejs18 is earlier than 18.20.2-2, affected by CVE-2023-21100
